1 a.definition: to be or continue to be in operation or effect

sub_terms.b: to proceed toward expiration or effectiveness [statute of limitations began to when she received notice of the injury] compare

2.definition: to continue to accrue or become payable in an amount increasing with the passing of time [interestfrom a particular date]
